quotes.author: Martin Golding
quotes.quote: Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.

quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra
quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.

quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
quotes.quote: Most good programmers do programming not because they expect to get paid or get adulation by the public, but because it is fun to program.

quotes.author: Martin Fowler
quotes.quote: Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.

quotes.author: Steve McConnell
quotes.quote: Good code is its own best documentation. As you’re about to add a comment, ask yourself, ‘How can I improve the code so that this comment isn’t needed?

quotes.author: Ken Thompson
quotes.quote: One of my most productive days was throwing away 1000 lines of code.

quotes.author: Seymour Cray
quotes.quote: The trouble with programmers is that you can never tell what a programmer is doing until it’s too late.

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: Um eine Einkommensteuererklärung abgeben zu können, muß man ein Philosoph sein. Für einen Mathematiker ist es zu schwierig.

Erst wenn der letzte FTP Server kostenpflichtig, der letzte GNU-Sourcecode verkauft, der letzte Algorithmus patentiert, der letzte Netzknoten verkommerzialisert ist, werdet Ihr merken, dass Geld nicht von alleine programmiert.
Bevorzuge Portierbarkeit vor Effizienz.
Unix wurde nicht entwickelt, um seine Benutzer daran zu hindern, dumme Dinge zu tun, denn das würde diese auch davon abhalten, schlaue Dinge zu tun.

quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie
quotes.quote: Unix ist einfach. Es erfordert lediglich ein Genie, um seine Einfachheit zu verstehen.

quotes.author: Tyler Durden
quotes.quote:
1. Regel: Ihr verliert kein Wort über den Fight Club.
2. Regel: Ihr verliert KEIN WORT über den Fight Club.

quotes.author: Jeff Pesis
quotes.quote: Hardware: The parts of a computer system that can be kicked.

quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
quotes.quote: Computers are useless. They can only give you answers.
The problem with troubleshooting is that trouble shoots back.
A computer lets you make more mistakes faster than any invention in human history-with the possible exceptions of handguns and tequila.

quotes.author: Karl Marx
quotes.quote: The production of too many useful things results in too many useless people.

quotes.author: John Tudor
quotes.quote: Technology makes it possible for people to gain control over everything, except over technology.
Like car accidents, most hardware problems are due to driver error.
Programmers are tools for converting caffeine into code.
My software never has bugs. It just develops random features.
The great thing about Object Oriented code is that it can make small, simple problems look like large, complex ones.
After Perl everything else is just assembly language.
The Internet: where men are men, women are men, and children are FBI agents.
There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.
Difference between a virus and windows ? Viruses rarely fail.
1f u c4n r34d th1s u r34lly n33d t0 g37 l41d
Hacking is like sex. You get in, you get out, and hope that you didn't leave something that can be traced back to you.

quotes.author: Dade
quotes.quote: Mess with the best, die like the rest.
